title: Kelly Clarkson reveals baby No. 2's gender
text: Kelly Clarkson Reveals Sex of Baby No. 2 00:37 Exciting news for Kelly Clarkson and Brandon Blackstock!The two, who share a 1-year-old daughter, River Rose Blackstock, are expecting a baby boy! The 33-year-old pop star, who had announced her pregnancy in August at one of her concerts, revealed on Friday she and her husband are expecting a... Recent related news The 'Invincible' singer says her little daughter River is going to have 'a little baby brother' soon. AceShowbiz 50 minutes ago - Entertainment Clarkson announced her second pregnancy during a concert in August. Page Six 1 hour ago - Celebrities Congrats are in order for the "Invincible" singer. Entertainment Tonight 2 hours ago - Celebrities We've been eagerly anticipating this moment! On Friday, Kelly Clarkson revealed the gender of her second baby in an incredibly adorable way. The American Idol... Perez Hilton 2 hours ago - Celebrities
